Original:
從永春時期追隨到新址，新面貌的晃，有別於過去社區型態，大幅改變風格以及更新菜單，這間店在一級戰區能夠吸引所有人的目光，質感、樸實、絕對好喝。

在新的酒單上選了六杯不同的酒，每一杯都很驚艷、充滿層次感、細膩。

非常非常喜歡，希望愛店生意長紅，並且永遠能吸引到好客人們光顧。
也希望這些好店員們長長久久，他們很棒！
EN:
From the Yongchun period to the new site, the new appearance is different from the past community form. It has greatly changed the style and updated the menu. This store can attract everyone's attention in the first -level theater, texture, simple, and absolutely delicious.

Six cups of different wines were selected on the new wine list. Each cup was amazing, full of layers, and delicate.

I like it very much. I hope the business of the shop will be red, and it will always attract good guests to patronize.
I also hope that these good clerks can last for a long time, they are great!

Original:
可以用信用卡付款，室外有抽菸區可以坐，室內位子不多偏擠，但環境還滿舒適的，店員也很親切～

餐點的部分這次點炸物拼盤，分量很多，有薯條、起司條、雞柳條、洋蔥圈，醬料類似莎莎醬，也可以跟店家要番茄醬👍🏼
還有點饅頭辣椒奶油豬，這個也很好吃，是炸饅頭為底，料是辣椒奶油豬（但不太辣）吃起來滿熱炒的口味，算滿推薦的！
調酒這次點的都滿普通的，但也不會難喝，就中規中矩，還算可以😌

整體算滿推薦的店，在虎林街的巷弄裡👍🏼
EN:
You can pay with a credit card. There are smoking areas to sit outdoors. The indoor seats are not squeezed, but the environment is still comfortable. The clerk is also very kind ~

The meal part of the fryer is the frying platter, with a lot of weight, including French fries, cheese strips, chicken willow strips, onion circles, sauce is similar to Sasa sauce, you can also ask the store for tomato sauce 👍🏼 👍🏼 👍🏼 👍🏼 👍🏼 👍🏼 👍🏼
There is also a little buns, pepper cream pork, this is also delicious. It is fried buns at the bottom. It is expected that the pepper cream pork (but not too spicy) tastes full of hot fried flavor, which is full of recommended!
The bartender is full of ordinary this time, but it is not difficult to drink.

The overall recommended shop is in the alley of Hulin Street 👍🏼 👍🏼 👍🏼

Original:
離永春捷運站很近的酒吧，外面有吸煙區，裡面環境大小適中很舒適。
Menu設計非常好，按照基底下去設計menu～讓人一看就懂 知道自己想喝什麼的方向。
有幾款所藏調酒 也很不錯 有加入乾冰，製造效果，讓客人拍照，但是那個乾冰的煙非常的臭，不像一般乾冰沒有味道。
這次唯一比較失望的是$150的茶包式紅茶，又被加了很多糖；我知道酒吧 點茶飲很白吃，但至少問過客人要不要加這麼多糖，或者另附上糖，會比較好。
整體上來感覺很不錯，會再回訪。
EN:
A bar is close to Yongchun MRT Station, there are smoking areas outside, and the environment is very comfortable.
Menu design is very good. Design Menu according to the base ~ Let people know what they want to drink at a glance.
Several hidden bartender is also very good. It is very good to add dried ice and make the manufacturing effect, so that the guests take pictures, but the dry ice smoke is very stinky, unlike ordinary dry ice without taste.
The only disappointment this time was the $ 150 tea bag -style black tea, which had been added with a lot of sugar; I knew that the bar tea was delicious, but at least asked the guests if they wanted to add so sugar or attach another sugar, it would be compared good.
The whole feels very good, and I will return to visit again.

It can be seen that there are shops operating attentive and will visit again next time.

Original: 它無疑是台北最好的酒吧，以其極其友好和安全的氛圍而聞名。它是出於對工藝和顧客的熱愛和奉獻而創建的，提供最優質的服務、獨特的雞尾酒和美味的食物。無論您住在台北還是只是來旅遊，您都會發現這是一個絕佳的地方。
EN: It is undoubtedly the best bar in Taipei, known for its extremely friendly and safe atmosphere.It was created for the love and dedication of craftsmanship and customers, providing the best quality services, unique cocktails and delicious food.Whether you live in Taipei or just travel, you will find that this is an excellent place.

Original: 現代日本餐廳，靠近通化夜市，提供非常雄心勃勃的雞尾酒節目。優質飲品分為經典、招牌和經典混合類別（我個人最喜歡的），以及輕盈、烈性和鹹味雞尾酒的完美組合。如果你遇到像我一樣馬馬虎虎的中國人，你還是可以透過一點努力過得去，而且他們非常友好。無法談論食物，因為我大部分時間都在喝酒，但它有一個有趣的現代居酒屋美食組合。只收現金，所以要做好準備。
EN: Modern Japanese restaurants, close to the Tonghua Night Market, provide very ambitious cocktail programs.High -quality beverages are divided into the perfect combination of classic, signatures and classic mixed categories (my personal favorite), as well as light, strong and salty cocktails.If you meet a Chinese like me, you can still live through a little effort, and they are very friendly.Can't talk about food, because I am drinking most of my time, but it has an interesting modern izakaya food combination.Only collect cash, so be prepared.

Original:
IG：foodie_foxx
Twinkle，一個獨特而不同的酒吧名稱，氛圍是如此令人驚訝，昏暗，如此喜怒無常和舒適。最適合情侶坐下來喝酒的地方。有室內和室外的桌子，還有一個非常舒適的吸煙區（吸煙區）。

酒吧主桌擺設也很棒，他們有3個高大可愛的調酒師哈哈，和我一起來的姑娘們一直很佩服他們🤧🤧🤧。

來這裡的主要是女孩子，是為了和帥氣可愛的調酒師聊天，而且那裡都是熟人，從他們的反應以及和調酒師玩得開心的樣子，我就可以得出結論了。

主菜和開胃菜真的多汁、美味、新鮮。

1.蔥椒麵－一種台灣麵條，煮得很好，完全煮熟，這是我最喜歡的。

2.煙櫻桃鴨胸－親吻做這道菜的人，鴨子的嫩肉正在融化😍外皮撕裂了我的心，讓我渴望更多。

3.豬肉乾貝餃子－綠色的餃子，熱氣騰騰，很軟，感覺餃子個頭很大，裡面的餡料有點少，但餃子的外層卻無可挑剔😋誘人。
4.小麥啤酒
5. 酒吧特色菜，可以混合所有東西 - 我喜歡他們用非常不同的杯子提供雞尾酒的方式，就像喝鄉村酒的古老方式一樣，很古董
6.炸雞翅

一切都很棒，飲料和食物都是 5/5 顆星。
總帳單為 1890 新台幣

祝大家胃口好
平安✌✌✌
EN:
IG: FOODIE_FOXX
Twinkle, a unique and different bar name, the atmosphere is so surprising, dim, so angry and comfortable.The most suitable place for couples to sit down and drink.There are indoor and outdoor tables, and a very comfortable smoking area (smoking area).

The main table of the bar is also great. They have 3 tall and cute bartenders haha, and the girls who came with me have always admired them.

The main thing is girls here to chat with the handsome and cute bartender, and there are acquaintances there. From their reactions and playing happily with the bartender, I can draw conclusions.

The main dishes and appetizers are really juicy, delicious, and fresh.

1. Onion and pepper noodles -a kind of Taiwanese noodles, cooked well, completely cooked, this is my favorite.

2. Smoke cherry duck breasts -kissing people who make this dish, the tender meat of the duck is melting the outer skin to tear my heart, making me long for more.

3. Pork shells dumplings -green dumplings, hot air, very soft, I feel that the dumplings are very large, and the fillings inside are a bit less, but the outer layer of the dumplings is impeccable and seductive.
4. Wheat beer
5. Bar special dishes, you can mix everything -I like the way they provide cocktails with very different cups, just like the ancient way of drinking rural wine, very antique
6. Fried chicken wings

Everything is great, drinks and food are 5/5 stars.
The general bill is NT $ 1890

I wish you a good appetite
Ping An ✌✌✌

Original:
美味的食物、一流的氛圍、專業的服務和酒吧禮儀。
飲料品質上乘，肯定會推薦，尤其是私人房間，您可以在那裡與朋友一起閒逛，而不必擔心打擾其他顧客。
EN:
Delicious food, first -class atmosphere, professional service and bar etiquette.
The quality of beverages will definitely recommend, especially in private rooms. You can wander with friends there without having to worry about disturbing other customers.
